entries.label: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
Ministry Of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
Ministry of Fisheries,Animal Husbandry and Dairying
Ministry Of New and Renewable Energy
Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
Ministry of Women and Child Development
Ministry Of Skill Development And Entrepreneurship
Ministry Of Personnel, Public Grievances And Pensions
Ministry Of Petroleum and Natural Gas
Comptroller And Auditor General Of India
Ministry Of Environment,forests and climate change
Ministry Of Consumer Affairs, Food And Public Distribution
Ministry Of Development Of North Eastern Region
Ministry Of Statistics and Programme Implementation
NITI Aayog (National Institution for Transforming India)

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Shiksha Protsahan Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The "Mukhyamantri Shiksha Protsahan Yojana" by the Directorate of Higher Education, Department of Higher and Technical Education, Government of Jharkhand, aims to provide free coaching and financial assistance to students prepare for national level competitive examinations like JEE, NEET, CLAT, NHMC

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Vishesh Yogyajan Swaraozgar Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to specially-abled individuals for self-employment. Under this scheme, a loan of ₹5,00,000/- will be provided to specially-abled individuals in the state whose annual family income does not exceed ₹2,00,000/-, enabling them to start their own business.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Rural Development
fields.schemeName: Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme
fields.briefDescription: A non-contributory pension scheme to provide social security to widows of poor family (BPL)  of the society.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Jal Shakti
fields.schemeName: Swachh Bharat Mission – Grameen PHASE I
fields.briefDescription: A sanitation scheme for the financial assistance of Rs 12,000 for construction of Individual Household Latrines (IHHL) for any household in rural area that does not have access to an individual household toilet.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Skill Development And Entrepreneurship
fields.schemeName: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana - Recognition Of Prior Learning
fields.briefDescription: A skill development scheme by Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship that enables Indian youth with prior learning experience or skills to obtain industry-relevant skill certification.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Skill Development And Entrepreneurship
fields.schemeName: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana - Short Term Training
fields.briefDescription: A skill development scheme by Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship for school/college dropouts/unemployed aged 15-45 at PMKVY Training Centres (TCs).

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Defence
fields.schemeName: RMEWF-Financial Assistance For Ex-Servicemen In Penury
fields.briefDescription: A scheme to provide financial assistance to non-pensioner Ex-Servicemen up to rank of Havildar /equivalent and their widows who are living in extreme poverty.

fields.schemeName: Union Territory of Lakshadweep Pension Scheme for Abandoned Ladies/Destitute
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to provide monthly financial assistance of ₹1,500/- to abandoned ladies & destitute women in the UT. The scheme covers women who have been divorced or abandoned by their husband or relatives, have not remarried, & are without any source of income or have only a nominal income.

fields.schemeName: Arka Vertical Garden
fields.briefDescription: "Arka Vertical Garden" aims to promote vertical gardening in urban and peri-urban areas to increase self-sufficiency and produce pesticide-free vegetables. The scheme provides subsidized vertical garden structures to help families grow their choice of vegetables using vertical space.

fields.schemeName: Special Jobs to PwDs - Clerical Assistant
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to provide employment opportunities to Persons with Disabilities (PwDs) to enhance their financial independence and social inclusion. Through this scheme, PwDs are employed as Clerical Assistants for 89 Days under the District Panchayat offices of their respective islands.

fields.schemeName: Scheme for assistance for Start Ups/ Innovation: Seed Support
fields.briefDescription: The "Scheme for Assistance for Start Ups/ Innovation" under the Gujarat Industrial Policy, aims to drive economic growth by generating jobs, fostering competition, and introducing next-gen solutions.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
fields.schemeName: MeitY - Visvesvaraya PhD Scheme For Electronics & IT
fields.briefDescription: A scholarship scheme by the Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology with an objective to enhance the number of PhDs in Electronics System Design & Manufacturing (ESDM) and IT/IT Enabled Services (IT/ITES) sectors in the country.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry of Education
fields.schemeName: Post Graduate Indira Gandhi Scholarship For Single Girl Child
fields.briefDescription: A scholarship scheme by the University Grants Commission for Girl students who are admitted in the first year of PG courses in any designated university or a postgraduate college, and happen to be the only girl child in the family. The amount of fellowship is ₹ 36,200/- per annum.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry of Education
fields.schemeName: Junior Research Fellowship (JRF) And Research Associateship (RA) For Foreign Nationals
fields.briefDescription: The scheme was initiated keeping in view the political and cultural bilateral relations of India with other developing countries: Asia, Africa, Latin America. The scheme has opened new vistas for foreign students and teachers, enable them to come to India and undertake advanced studies and research.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
fields.schemeName: National Talent Scholarship Undergraduate
fields.briefDescription: National Talent Scholarship (NTS) was launched by the Indian Council of Agricultural Research for students pursuing a Bachelor's or Master's degree program in an ICAR-recognized agricultural university located outside of his/her state of domicile.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Petroleum and Natural Gas
fields.schemeName: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana
fields.briefDescription: A scheme by Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas for Providing free LPG connections to women belonging to the Below Poverty Line (BPL) households.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Labour and Employment
fields.schemeName: Scheme For Award Of Financial Assistance For Education To The Wards Of Beedi/Cine/IOMC/LSDM Workers – Pre & Post-Matric
fields.briefDescription: A scholarship scheme by the Directorate of Social Welfare, Ministry of Labour and Employment wherein financial assistance for education is provided to the Wards of Beedi/IOMC/LSDM Workers, varying from ₹1,000/- to ₹25,000/- per student per annum. The benefits are transferred through the DBT system.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry of Education
fields.schemeName: AICTE – Saksham Scholarship Scheme For Specially-Abled Student (Diploma)
fields.briefDescription: Saksham is a Scholarship Scheme by the Ministry of Education, implemented by AICTE, aimed at providing encouragement and support to specially-abled children to pursue technical education. This is an attempt to give every young specially-abled student the opportunity to study further.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: Pre-Matric Scholarship
fields.briefDescription: The scholarship is designed to provide OBC students with the necessary financial resources studying at pre-matriculation stage to enable them to complete their education.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry of Fisheries,Animal Husbandry and Dairying
fields.schemeName: Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Introduced by the Department of Fisheries, Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana (PMMSY) is a scheme to bring about ecologically healthy, economically viable, and socially inclusive development of the fisheries sector of India.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
fields.schemeName: Indian Agricultural Research Institute - Scholarship
fields.briefDescription: The Indian Agricultural Research Institute (IARI) Junior and Senior Scholarship shall be awarded to M.Sc. and Ph.D. students admitted under General Open Competition Scheme.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Minority Affairs
fields.schemeName: Shahari Waqf Sampatti Vikas Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Under the scheme, interest free loan to Waqf Boards (WBs)/waqf institutions is granted to various Waqf Boards and Waqf Institutions in the country for construction of economically viable buildings on the Waqf land, such as commercial complex, marriage halls, hospitals, cold storage etc..

fields.schemeName: Soft Loan Scheme for Women Entrepreneurs
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Soft Loan Scheme for Women Entrepreneurs” was started under Kerala Startup Mission to support women startups with a soft loan of an amount limited to ₹15 Lakhs as working capital for implementing works & projects received from Govt. departments and Public Sector Undertaking in Kerala.

fields.schemeName: Scheme to Provide Assistance to Processing Units in State Market Committees
fields.briefDescription: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat. It aims to support market committees in Gujarat by providing financial assistance for the establishment of processing units.

fields.schemeName: West Bengal Transport Workers’ Social Security Scheme: Assistance for Marriage
fields.briefDescription: The scheme provides financial aid for the marriage of eligible beneficiaries or their dependent sons/daughters (up to two marriages).

fields.schemeName: Maternity Benefit (CBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, financial assistance shall be given to the spouse of registered beneficiary woman employee after the delivery of child.

fields.schemeName: Ashirwad
fields.briefDescription: The Punjabi government has established the Punjab Ashirwad Scheme to offer financial support for a girl's marriage.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) for MSME Sector: Assistance For Entrepreneurship Under Skill Development
fields.briefDescription: “Assistance For Entrepreneurship Under Skill Development” under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)” for MSME sector, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, DNH & DD, aims to provide assistance to budding entrepreneurs and their staffs to undergo Entrepreneurship /Management training.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) for MSME Sector: Assistance For Zed Certification
fields.briefDescription: “Assistance For Zed Certification” under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)” for MSME sector, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, U.T. Administration Of DNH & DD, was introduced to urge industries, especially (MSMEs), to manufacture goods in the country with “Zero Defects”.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) for MSME Sector: Incentives For Doubling Of Export Values
fields.briefDescription: “Incentives For Doubling Of Export Values” under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)” for MSME sector, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, U.T. Administration Of DNH & DD, aims to extend support to MSMEs to increase exports and enhance export values.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) for MSME Sector: Assistance For Saving In Consumption Of Energy And Water
fields.briefDescription: “Assistance For Saving In Consumption Of Energy And Water” under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)” for MSME sector, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, DNH & DD, aims to provide assistance to the existing/ new Enterprise for taking action for saving in consumption of Energy and Water.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) for MSME Sector: Assistance of Fixed Capital Investment Subsidy
fields.briefDescription: “Assistance of Fixed Capital Investment Subsidy” under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)” for MSME sector, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, U.T. Administration Of  DNH & DD, aims to provide subsidy for the investment made in Gross Fixed Capital investment (GFCI).

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) for MSME Sector: Incentive For Local Employment
fields.briefDescription: “Incentive For Local Employment” under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)” for MSME sector, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, U.T. Administration Of DNH & DD, aims to provide One-time recruitment incentive to the Industrial Units for generating employment for local residents.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) for MSME Sector: Awards For MSMEs
fields.briefDescription: “Awards For MSMEs” under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)” for MSME sector, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, U.T. Administration Of DNH & DD, aims to facilitate the best MSMEs with awards for their achievements in different aspects.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Skill Development for the Construction Workers
fields.briefDescription: The "Skill Development for the Construction Workers'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department,  U.T. of DNH & DD, is a welfare scheme that provides financial assistance in the form of stipend to the workers who attend the training programs under “Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana”.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Saraswati Vidya Yojana: Free Distribution of Bicycles
fields.briefDescription: “Free Distribution of Bicycles'' under “Saraswati Vidya Yojana”, implemented by the Directorate of Education, U.T. Administration Of DNH & DD, aims to provide bicycles free of cost to all the girl students, studying in class VIII(8) in the Govt. & Govt. aided schools/ Institutes.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Pension Scheme to Old Age Persons (Senior Citizen)
fields.briefDescription: The objective of this scheme is to provide financial support to eligible senior citizens to cater to their basic needs. The scheme benefits senior citizens aged 60 years and above, providing a monthly pension of ₹1,500/- for those aged 60–69 years and ₹2,000/- for those aged 70 years and above.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Health and Maternity Cover for the Construction Workers
fields.briefDescription: The "Health and Maternity Cover for the Construction Workers'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department,  U.T. Administration of DNH & DD, is a welfare scheme that provides maternity benefits in the form of financial assistance to the eligible registered women members of the board.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Pension Scheme to Widow
fields.briefDescription: The scheme is implemented by the Social Welfare Department, aims to provide financial assistance to widows aged between 18-59 years. The scheme offers ₹1,000/- per month to help meet their basic needs, ensuring public assistance for widows in need of support to maintain a dignified life.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeShortTitle: SS-DADRA AND NAGAR HAVELI AND DAMAN & DIU
fields.schemeName: Swabhimaan Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The Union Territory of Daman & Diu and Dadra & Nagar Haveli has successfully launched the “Swabhimaan Scheme” scheme to tackle the problems of Malnutrition, Anemia, and other relevant issues.

fields.schemeName: Chief Minister Kanya Utthan Yojana
fields.briefDescription: A Scheme Chief Minister Kanya Utthan Yojana started under the Social Welfare Department by Bihar State Government for the social empowerment of females.

fields.schemeName: Transgender Pension Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The Transgender Pension Scheme is a welfare initiative launched by the Government of Himachal Pradesh for the upliftment and support of transgender persons.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry of Fisheries,Animal Husbandry and Dairying
fields.schemeName: National Livestock Mission: Establishment of State Semen Bank
fields.briefDescription: "Establishment of State Semen Bank (Genetic Improvement of Sheep and Goat breeds)" aims at the genetic improvement of sheep/goat breeds through selective breeding by propagation of superior male germplasm through artificial insemination.

fields.schemeName: Saphalam Scheme For Transgender Students Pursuing Professional Courses
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Saphalam Scheme for Transgender Students Pursuing Professional Courses” was launched by the Department of Social Justice, Government of Kerala.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: National Award For Senior Citizens (vayoshreshtha Samman): Iconic Mother
fields.briefDescription: The award is conferred to the eminent and outstanding senior citizens and institutions/organizations involved in rendering distinguished service for the cause of elderly persons, especially indigent senior citizens. The awards are conferred on 1st October every year by the Hon’ble President of India

fields.schemeName: Financial Aid For Providing Hostel Facility To Transgender Students
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Financial Aid for Providing Hostel Facility to Transgender Students” was launched by the Department of Social Justice, Government of Kerala.

fields.schemeName: Paternity Benefit Scheme (HBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Paternity Benefit Scheme (HBOCWWB)” was launched by the Haryana Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (HBOCWWB), Labour Department Haryana.

fields.schemeName: Ladli Social Security Allowance Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Launched on 1st January 2006, the “Ladli Social Security Allowance Scheme” is a flagship social-security scheme by the Department of Social Justice and Empowerment, Government of Haryana. The family receives ₹2,750/- per month for 15 years after either of the two parents completes 45 years of age.

fields.schemeName: Ladli Laxmi Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Ladli Lakshmi Yojana has been started in Madhya Pradesh for Girl Child in 2007.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry of Fisheries,Animal Husbandry and Dairying
fields.schemeName: National Livestock Mission: Establishment of Entrepreneurship for Breed Development of Rural Poultry
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to promote entrepreneurship in rural poultry farming. Through this scheme, a 50% capital subsidy is provided for establishing Parent Farms, Rural Hatcheries, and Brooder cum Mother Units.

fields.schemeName: AGR-61 Agro Service Providers for the Purpose of Making Farming More Profitable With the Help of Farm Mechanization
fields.briefDescription: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Dept., Gujarat. It aims to support farmers in Gujarat by facilitating access to farm implements and mechanization.

fields.schemeName: To Assist the Farmers for Construction of Community Base Water Tank/Storage Structure for Efficient Use of Water Through Drip Irrigation
fields.briefDescription: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat. It aims to provide financial assistance to farmers for constructing community-based water tanks/storage structures to ensure efficient water use through drip irrigation.

fields.schemeName: Use of Advanced Drone Technology (Agriculture Aircraft) in Agriculture Sector
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Use of Advanced Drone Technology (Agriculture Aircraft) in Agriculture Sector" introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Dept., Gujarat, aims to promote the use of advanced drone technology for spraying crop protection chemicals and bio-fertilizers, etc.

fields.schemeName: Millet Development Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The "Millet Development Scheme" introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Dept., Gujarat, aims to promote millet cultivation in Gujarat by organizing promotional activities, expos, processing units, demonstrations(seed/input kit ), and taluka-level melas.

fields.schemeName: Farm Storage Structure Scheme
fields.briefDescription: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Dept., Gujarat. It aims to help farmers to protect their harvested crops from damage due to natural calamities and store them safely for better financial returns by selling at optimal prices.

fields.schemeName: Home for Mentally Challenged Children
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Home for Mentally Challenged Children" by the Department of Social Welfare, Government of Puducherry, aims to provide care for children facing mental challenges, i.e. low Intelligence Quotient (IQ). The scheme offers free boarding and lodging, uniform sets, daily living needs, etc.

fields.schemeName: Moovalur Ramamirtham Ammaiyar Ninaivu Marriage Assistance Scheme-1
fields.briefDescription: In this scheme, ₹ 25,000/- and an 8-gram gold coin is given to brides who have studied Class 10th. This scheme is only applicable for the marriage conducted from 17th May 2011 onwards. The objective of the scheme is to help financially poor parents in getting their daughters mar

fields.schemeName: Chhattisgarh Mukhyamantri Kanya Vivah Yojana
fields.briefDescription: In view of the difficulty faced by poor families regarding the marriage of the girl child, the Mukhyamantri Kanya Vivah Yojana has been implemented.

fields.schemeName: Grant on Passing the Written Examination of Competitive Examinations for Recruitment in Armed Forces
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, a grant of ₹15,000/- is provided from the Amalgamated Fund to the children of ex-servicemen who pass the written examination of CDS, NDA, IMA, OTA, Air Force, or Naval Academy, for the purpose of coaching.

fields.schemeName: Leather Training Scheme - Rajasthan
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to promote leather industry, improve production & quality of leather products, develop new designs, & generate self-employment. Under this scheme, training is provided in latest techniques for leather dyeing, Nagara Jooti, leather goods, etc. through District Industry Centers.

fields.schemeName: Old Age Pension To Handloom Weavers Under Coop. Fold
fields.briefDescription: The “Old Age Pension To Handloom Weavers” scheme implemented by the MSME and Textiles Dept., aims to provide monthly financial assistance in the form of pension to a weaver member of a handloom cooperative society.

fields.schemeName: West Bengal Incentive Scheme for Approved Industrial Park (SAIP) for MSMEs: Construction of Approach Road
fields.briefDescription: The “Construction of Approach Road” under the “SAIP for MSMEs” scheme, facilitates the Private Industrial Park in provision with Approach Road catering to the AIP.

fields.schemeName: Assistance for Quality Enhancement
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to support micro and small enterprises in obtaining quality and system certifications or IPRs. It offers up to 50% reimbursement of certification costs with a ceiling of ₹3,00,000.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry of Corporate Affairs
fields.schemeName: Internship Programme At Serious Fraud Investigation Office
fields.briefDescription: The Internship Programme at SFIO was started in 2017 to provide a platform for the interaction of talented and young scholars and researchers from reputed academic institutions who are pursuing Post-Graduation/Research Programs in Economics/ Commerce/Law/ Management and Computer Forensics, etc.

fields.schemeName: Diesel VAT Relief Scheme for Fishermen
fields.briefDescription: The "Diesel VAT Relief Scheme for Fishermen" introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat, aims to provide financial assistance by subsidizing the VAT levied on high-speed diesel used in fishing boats.

fields.schemeName: To Increase Fish Seed Production and Inland Fisheries Equipment in Tribal Areas
fields.briefDescription: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat. It aims to enhance fish production and provide employment opportunities to Scheduled Tribes (ST) individuals engaged in inland fisheries.

fields.schemeName: Indira Priyadarshini Award
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to promote academic excellence among girl students by providing one-time financial rewards to those securing the first position in Class 8th, 10th, and 12th examinations, along with vocational & Swami Vivekanand Government Model Schools achievers at the district and state levels.

fields.schemeName: Scheme for Additional Interest Subsidy over and above RIPS 2024 and Reimbursement of Annual Credit Guarantee Fee
fields.briefDescription: As per the MSME Policy 2024, it supports the establishment of new MSMEs and the expansion, diversification, or modernization of existing ones by offering interest subsidies and reimbursement of guarantee fees to ease access to finance and reduce the cost of credit.

fields.schemeName: Assistance Towards Expenses Incurred for Raising of Funds through NSE’s/ BSE’s SME Exchange Platform
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, the Govt. of Rajasthan will provide one-time support up to a maximum of ₹15,00,000/- towards expenses incurred for raising of funds through NSE’s/ BSE’s SME exchange platform after successful raising of equity.

fields.schemeName: Patrakar Kritadnyata Nidhi Scheme (Journalist Benevolent Fund)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to journalists in Goa for emergencies like medical treatment, marriage, and education. Benefits include aid up to ₹2,00,000/and scholarships for dependents. Eligible journalists must be registered and working in Goa for at least three years.

fields.schemeName: Compensation in Animal Death
fields.briefDescription: The "Compensation in Animal Death" scheme introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat, provides financial assistance to animal breeders who suffer livestock losses due to natural disasters, diseases, or poisoning.

fields.schemeName: Establishment of 1 to 20 Milch Animal Farm
fields.briefDescription: The "Establishment of 1 to 20 Milch Animal Farm" scheme introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat, provides financial assistance in the form of an interest subsidy to livestock farmers to take up animal husbandry as a sustainable business.

fields.schemeName: Bakri Palan Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, financial assistance is provided by the State Government to eligible beneficiaries for purchasing goats to establish a goat-rearing unit comprising 10 female goats and 1 male goat, for a duration of 10 to 14 months.

fields.schemeName: Establishment of Poultry Valley (Poultry Farming)
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, poultry farmers are supported in rearing 750 chicks annually in three phases. Each year, 500 one-day-old chicks will be provided to farmers by the Animal Husbandry Department from the State Sector Budget through MPACS, while the remaining 250 chicks will be arranged by the farmer.

fields.schemeName: Development of Brackish Water Aquaculture
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Development of Brackish Water Aquaculture" introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat, aims to support the development of brackish water aquaculture through financial assistance for infrastructure, equipment, and modern shrimp farming techniques.

fields.schemeName: Chief Minister BC & EBC Chhatravas Anudan Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The "Chief Minister BC & EBC Chhatravas Anudan Yojana", implemented by the Backward Classes and Extremely Backward Classes Welfare Department, provides financial assistance to students from Backward Classes (BC) and Extremely Backward Classes (EBC) residing in government hostels.

fields.schemeName: Subsidy Scheme on Establishment of 25 R.I.R. Bird’s Unit, 100 Broiler Bird’s Unit and Stipend for Poultry Farming Training for Scheduled Caste People
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to support Scheduled Caste individuals by providing financial assistance for poultry farming.

fields.schemeName: Establishment of Goat Unit (10 +1)
fields.briefDescription: The "Establishment of Goat Unit (10+1)" scheme by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat, aims to promote the social and economic upliftment of goat breeders by encouraging goat breeding and genetic improvement through pure breeding.

fields.schemeName: Supply of Insulated Boxes
fields.briefDescription: A subsidy to the extent of 75% of the cost for the purchase of an insulated box of at least 50 liters capacity. Only the fisherman engaged in selling and marketing fish, fishing at sea with a canoe, and fishing at sea with a mechanized fishing vessel with upto 6-cylinder engines are eligible.

fields.schemeName: Grant of 50% Subsidy for the Purchase of Aquarium and Its Accessories under "Development of Freshwater Aquaculture and Setting up of Aquarium, Ornamental Fish Breeding Centre"
fields.briefDescription: "Grant of 50% Subsidy for the Purchase of Aquarium and Its Accessories" is introduced with the objective to propagate the importance of aquarium keeping and to inculcate the art of aquarium keeping among the general public. The scheme is extended to all the regions of Puducherry.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: Vocational Education and Training Loan Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The Vocational Education and Training Loan Scheme provides financial assistance to youth of the target group to enhance their skills & employability.

fields.schemeName: Assistance to Traditional Pottery Makers
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Assistance to Traditional Pottery Makers” provides financial assistance to Traditional Pottery makers belonging to the state OBC category for the purchase of modern machinery for job modernization.

fields.schemeName: AGR 2 (Farm Mechanization) Scheme Of Farmers Other Than SC/ST
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “AGR 2 (Farm Mechanization) Scheme of Farmers Other Than SC/ST” was started by the Department of Agriculture, Farmers Welfare & Co-operation, Government of Gujarat.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Science And Technology
fields.schemeName: SERB International Research Experience
fields.briefDescription: The Science and Engineering Research Board (SERB), a statutory body under the Department of Science and Technology, Government of India has launched "SERB International Research Experience (SIRE)".

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance for Purchase of Stake Net and its Accessories
fields.briefDescription: “Financial Assistance for Purchase of Stake Net and its Accessories” is a scheme by the Dept. of Fisheries, Govt. of Goa. Under this scheme, financial assistance is provided in the form of a subsidy on the purchase of stake nets and accessories for the fishermen.

fields.schemeName: Asangathit Karmakar Prasuti Sahayata Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme "Asangathit Karmakar Prasuti Sahayata Yojana" for unorganized worker on 10 April 2018.

fields.schemeName: Subsidy Scheme For Establishment Of Goat Unit (10+1) For Scheduled Caste People
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Subsidy Scheme for Establishment of Goat Unit (10+1) for Scheduled Caste People” was launched by the Dept. of Agriculture, Farmers Welfare & Co-operation, Government of Gujarat to uplift economically poor livestock breeders of Gujarat State.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Commerce And Industry
fields.schemeName: Coffee Development Programme in North Eastern Region: Expansion of Coffee
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Coffee Development Programme in North Eastern Region: Expansion of Coffee" by the Coffee Board, Department of Commerce, Ministry of Commerce and Industry, aims to facilitate afforestation in the Jhum lands and help settle the tribals on a permanent footing.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Home Affairs
fields.schemeName: Relief and Rehabilitation Assistance to Sri Lankan Refugees in the Refugee Camps
fields.briefDescription: The scheme provides relief materials, which among other things include Feeding Charges, Subsidized Rice, Clothing Materials, Utensils, Transportation Charges (on arrival), Porterage and Transport (on repatriation), Cash Doles, Infrastructure Facilities (at camps), Electricity, Drinking Water, etc.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Textiles
fields.schemeName: GROUP WORKSHED SCHEME
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to facilitate the establishment of worksheds for shuttleless looms in an existing or new cluster, which will provide the required scale of economy for business operations.

fields.schemeName: Self Employment Scheme - Goa
fields.briefDescription: "Self Employment Scheme" provides financial support up to a maximum of ₹ 10,00,000 to any individual person belonging to Scheduled Tribes Community to undertake any self-employment activities.

fields.schemeName: Grant of Subsidy for Procurement of Vehicle
fields.briefDescription: "Grant of Subsidy for Procurement of Vehicle" aims to facilitate the quick transportation of fish catches from landing centers to marketing places, thereby preventing/minimizing spoilage of fish. It provides a 50% subsidy for the procurement of specified vehicles.

fields.schemeName: Samajik Mukti
fields.briefDescription: The government issued 'Samajik Mukti' (Social Freedom) cards to unorganised sector workers of the State for Provident Fund & Other Social Benefit scheme.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Personnel, Public Grievances And Pensions
fields.schemeName: Central Vigilance Commission (CVC) Internship Scheme
fields.briefDescription: CVC initiated an Internship Scheme in the year 2016. This Scheme seeks to engage Indian Nationals, who are Graduates (awaiting final year results) /Post Graduate or Research Students enrolled in reputed Universities/Institutions in India or abroad.

fields.schemeName: Integrated Child Development Services: Chandigarh
fields.briefDescription: The Integrated Child Development Service (ICDS) Scheme providing for supplementary nutrition, immunization and pre-school education to the children is a popular flagship programme of the government. Launched in 1975, it is one of the world’s largest programmes providing for an integrated package of

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: Samarth-Respite Care Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Samarth (Respite Care) scheme, launched by the Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities, aims at setting up Samarth Centres for providing respite and residential care for the specified categories of Persons with Disability (PwD).

fields.schemeName: Asangathit Karmakar Ke Bachcho Hetu Chhatravriti Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Chhattisgarh state Government started a scheme "Asangathit Karmakar Ke Bachcho Hetu Chhatravriti Yojana" for unorganized worker on 10 April 2018

fields.schemeName: Madilu Kit
fields.briefDescription:
The Madilu Programme is a government initiative focused on empowering rural communities through skill development and entrepreneurship opportunities.
It aims to create sustainable livelihoods, reduce poverty, and enhance social and economic well-being in rural areas.

fields.schemeName: Award of Pre-matric Scholarship to Scheduled Caste Students Studying from VI to X Standard in Government Schools and Government recognised Private Schools in the Union Territory of Puducherry
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to provide financial assistance to Scheduled Caste students to complete their education up to the secondary level and to avoid dropping out of the Scheduled Caste students from their education.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of New and Renewable Energy
fields.schemeName: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Urja Suraksha Evam Utthan Mahabhiyan Scheme For Farmers.
fields.briefDescription: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Urja Surakshaevam Utthaan Mahabhiyan Yojana (PM-KUSUM Scheme) was launched in March 2019 by the Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE), to subsidize farmers to install solar irrigation pumps for cultivation. Each farmer will receive a 60% subsidy.
